bibl.title: Theocritus. Encomium of Ptolemy Philadelphus.
bibl.seg: HUNTER Richard (Text and Translation with Introduction and Commentary by), Theocritus. Encomium of Ptolemy Philadelphus. (Hellenistic Culture and Society. 39.)
Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, University of California Press, 2003, 8°, xii-226 pp. ISBN 0-520-23560-6. $39.95.
C.R. par Silvia Barbantani, CJ 100 (2004-2005) pp. 206-209. - Enrico Magnelli, Eikasmos 18 (2007) pp. 540-546. - Laurianne Martinez-Sève, Topoi 12-13 (2005) pp. 583-585.
